attributes.additional_details: I really feel it's a world wide problem that really needs to be addressed and just so we can enjoy outdoor areas without stepping in dog poo there's dog poo on parks and on the streets its awful I get it on my pram and my daughter stands in it and so do I it's very dangerous and disgusting and I used to be councilor in my high school I'm willing do what it takes to get this message out to people would we leave human poo on the streets and on parks or in a natural habitat no we wouldn't so why should people be able to leave dog poo everywhere it's unhygienic and we can't enjoy natural habitats or parks for children or a simple walk down the street !! Please help help this is my last hope and idea to save our children so they can play without worry or adults can walk without worry
attributes.background: I've contacted my council they aren't interested i need help there's dog poo on parks and on the streets and sand dunes it's everywhere I've put some dog poo signs up but i don't think this will be enough I want this message to go far and wide it's awful and it will be happening all over britain

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

National measures to prevent people leaving dog faeces on the streets: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700979
